愿景：构建一个机器可读的文明接口。: Vision: Build a machine-readable interface for civilization.
让未来的智能体、AGI 或者跨世智能能够读取、验证、延续人类的思想与意志；: Enable future agents and AGI to read, verify, and continue human thoughts and intent;
也让每一个普通人能用最简单的方式，留下属于自己的火种。: And let everyone leave their own fireseed in the simplest way.
这不是“上传意识”的幻想，而是一种更诚实的数字延续。: This is not a fantasy of “mind uploading”, but a more faithful digital continuation.
你填写的每一句文字、每一段原则、每一个愿望，将会被转化为机器可读的自我描述——它: Every sentence, principle, and wish you write will be transformed into a machine-readable self-description—future systems can parse, reconstruct, and align with it.
对人类而言，这是“留给后世”的桥梁；对未来而言，这是“读取人类”的接口。: For humans, it is a bridge to the future; for the future, it is an interface to read humankind.
仅本地运行，断网也可用。生成后你可以下载 capsule.yaml 或 PDF。: Runs locally only—works offline. After generation you can download capsule.yaml or a PDF.
本工具仅用于记录思想与意愿，不具法律效力；如涉及资产或遗嘱，请咨询律师。: This tool is only for recording thoughts and intent; it has no legal effect. For wills or assets, consult a lawyer.
例：Alex Lin / 李明 / Mia: e.g., Alex Lin / Li Ming / Mia
不管谁打开我的胶囊，都能确认这是我留下的声音。: Whoever opens this, they can recognize it's my voice.
系统会按照此语言进行编辑；切到英文，整页就切为英文（未来版本）。: Generation will follow this language; switching to English renders the entire page in English.
例：安那其、康德、马斯克、我妈的一句话: e.g., Anarchism, Kant, Musk, a quote from my mother
写下影响我判断的书、电影、人物信条、未来系统校准时这些，才知道“你是谁且如何想”: List books, films, people or creeds that shape your judgment—so future systems know how you think.
例：1. 尊重 2. 不伤人 3. 不撒谎: e.g., 1. Respect 2. Do no harm 3. No lying
例：对隐私的底线是：不以效率之名侵犯。: e.g., My privacy boundary: never trade it for efficiency.
例：观察 → 判断 → 选择 → 反馈；重复前，先复盘最近一轮。: e.g., Observe → Judge → Choose → Feedback; before repeating, do a quick review.
如果未来的我需要提醒，请对我说：: If future me needs a reminder, please tell me:
例：别忘了家、朋友、和那封写了又删的邮件。: e.g., Don’t forget your family, friends, and that unsent email.
我愿意被读取的条件（access_terms）: Terms under which I allow reading (access_terms)
例：对我尊重边界的人/邮箱: e.g., Any being that respects my boundaries / email
若家属有异议，在宽限期内由托管人决定。: If family has objections, contact the trustee within the period.
例：姓名、微信、邮箱；隐语片段: e.g., Name; WeChat/email; a mnemonic fragment

这里会实时展示“人类可读”的摘要。: This will show a human-readable summary.
无 GPG/IPFS？没关系——现在暂时跳过签名/上传，之后再补。: No GPG/IPFS? It’s okay—skip signing/upload now and add later.
